article_text: Patient was prescribed Dolo 650 for fever; it contains Paracetamol and is manufactured by Micro Labs Ltd.
Dolo 650 tablet from Micro Labs Ltd has Paracetamol as the active ingredient.
Azee 500 was advised for infection and it contains Azithromycin manufactured by Cipla.
Cipla produces Azee 500 which includes Azithromycin for bacterial infections.
Pan 40 was given for acidity; it contains Pantoprazole and is marketed by Alkem Laboratories.
Pantoprazole based Pan 40 is manufactured by Alkem Laboratories for gastric relief.
Ecosprin 75 contains Aspirin and is manufactured by USV Pvt Ltd for heart protection.
USV Pvt Ltd makes Ecosprin 75 which includes Aspirin for blood thinning therapy.
Montek LC was prescribed for allergy; it contains Montelukast + Levocetirizine produced by Sun Pharma.
Sun Pharma markets Montek LC containing Montelukast + Levocetirizine for allergic symptoms.
Crocin Advance contains Paracetamol and is manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline for fever management.
GlaxoSmithKline produces Crocin Advance which has Paracetamol for pain and fever.

Abbott manufactures Amoxyclav 625 containing Amoxicillin + Clavulanic Acid for bacterial conditions.
